text:
@realDonaldTrump YOU ARE AN EVIL SELFISH BASTARD! 

NO AMERICAN IS GOING TO SAY “OPEN THE ECONOMY AT THE COST OF HUMAN LIFE.”

ITS A SHAME IF PEOPLE WANT TO COMMIT SUICIDE BUT THAT IS THEIR CHOICE! 

COVID-19 IS NOT A CHOICE AND WE SHOULD’NT BE IN DANGER OF DEATH FOR YOUR RE-ELECTION!
